dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4267658G] On behalf of Ross J. Charap, Esq. re cowboylyrics.com
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Friday, May 25, 2007 9:45 AM To: DMCA Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4267658G] On behalf of Ross J. Charap, Esq. re cowboylyrics.com ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. On behalf of Ross J. Charap, Esq. re cowboylyrics.com Added by system at Friday, May 25 2007 09:33 am X-MailFrom: NEisner@MOSESSINGER.COM X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Fri May 25 09:33:09 2007 Received: (qmail 25667 invoked by alias); 25 May 2007 14:33:09 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 25660 invoked from network); 25 May 2007 14:33:08 -0000 Received: from spooling.theplanet.com (69.56.141.4) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 25 May 2007 14:33:08 -0000 Return-path: Delivery-date: Fri, 25 May 2007 09:33:08 -0500 Received: from [172.16.220.10] (helo=DALD2EXCH01.PLANET.LOCAL) by spooling.theplanet.com (envelope-from NEisner@MOSESSINGER.COM) with esmtp (Exim) id 1Hraqq-0005wd-Cg for abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net; Fri, 25 May 2007 09:33:08 -0500 Received: from Exchanger.ev1servers.net ([207.218.222.102]) by DALD2EXCH01.PLANET.LOCAL with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Fri, 25 May 2007 09:32:08 -0500 Received: from mailin.ev1servers.net ([207.218.222.124]) by Exchanger.ev1servers.net with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Fri, 25 May 2007 09:32:07 -0500 X-ASG-Debug-ID: 1180103521-2039-460-0 X-Barracuda-URL: http://207.218.222.124:8000/cgi-bin/mark.cgi X-ASG-Recipient-Whitelist: abuse@ev1servers.net Received: from webmail.mosessinger.com (webmail.mosessinger.com [63.119.63.39]) by mailin.ev1servers.net (Spam Firewall) with ESMTP id 5B7A6871EA for ; Fri, 25 May 2007 09:32:07 -0500 (CDT) X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft Exchange V6.5 Content-class: urn:content-classes:message MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----_=_NextPart_001_01C79ED9.6F36D3DD" X-ASG-Orig-Subj: On behalf of Ross J. Charap, Esq. re cowboylyrics.com Subject: On behalf of Ross J. Charap, Esq. re cowboylyrics.com Date: Fri, 25 May 2007 10:31:51 -0400 Message-ID: <27A194F8914099479166B26462E1B275010C4FE1@webmail.mosessinger.com> X-MS-Has-Attach: X-MS-TNEF-Correlator: Thread-Topic: On behalf of Ross J. Charap, Esq. re praise-worship.net Thread-Index: AceeQns7dLrwJcy/SfegXgFaZ27sNQAlfOpw From: "Nanci Eisner" To: , Cc: "Ross J. Charap" X-Virus-Scanned: by Barracuda Spam Firewall at ev1servers.net X-Barracuda-Spam-Score: 0.00 X-Barracuda-Spam-Status: No, SCORE=0.00 using global scores of TAG_LEVEL=4.0 QUARANTINE_LEVEL=1000.0 KILL_LEVEL=8.0 WHITELISTED X-OriginalArrivalTime: 25 May 2007 14:32:07.0523 (UTC) FILETIME=[78CE5B30:01C79ED9] (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) Everyones Internet Ltd. Chris Newcomb 390 Benmar - Suite 200 Houston, TX 77060 Re: DMCA - cowboylyrics.com Dear Mr. Newcomb: Please pardon my delay in responding to your email of April 2. The four compositions listed on our letter of March 15 were merely representative of the many compositions on your web site for which you have posted unauthorized tabs. The purpose of our letter was to request that you remove all unauthorized tabs, not just those related to the four compositions. We shall give you 2 additional weeks to remove all tabs before contacting your ISP. If the tabs are not down within that period, we shall demand that your ISP take down the site because you're posting infringing material. We hope that will not be necessary. By the way, The Harry Fox Agency, Inc. ("HFA") is offering an experimental license to web site operators that would authorize licensees to post tabs of compositions owned or controlled by publishers affiliated with HFA. You may contact them by mail, phone or email as follows: The Harry Fox Agency, Inc., 711 Third Avenue, New York, NY 10017, Attn: Ms. Lauren Apolito, Vice President of Business Development, 212.922.3225, email: lapolito@harryfox.com . Sincerely, Ross J. Charap (dictated and read) Nanci Eisner Assistant to Ross J. Charap, Esq. Moses & Singer LLP The Chrysler Building 405 Lexington Avenue New York, NY 10174-1299 T - 212.554.7610 direct T - 212.554.7800 main switchboard F - 212.554.7700 neisner@mosessinger.com IRS CIRCULAR 230 DISCLOSURE: To ensure compliance with requirements imposed by the IRS, we inform you that any U.S. tax advice contained in this communication (including any attachments) is not intended or written to be used, and cannot be used, for the purpose of (i) avoiding penalties under the Internal Revenue Code or (ii) promoting, marketing or recommending to another party any transaction or matter addressed herein. ************************************************************************ ******************** This message is being sent from a Law Firm and may contain CONFIDENTIAL or PRIVILEGED information. If you are not the intended recipient, do not printout, copy or distribute this message or any attachments. Advise the sender immediately by reply e-mail, and delete this message and attachments without retaining a copy. MIME element (text/html) On behalf of Ross J. Charap, Esq. re cowboylyrics.com

Everyones Internet Ltd.

Chris Newcomb

390 Benmar - Suite 200

Houston, TX  77060

        Re:  DMCA - cowboylyrics.com

Dear Mr. Newcomb:

Please pardon my delay in responding to your email of April 2. The four compositions listed on our letter of March 15 were merely representative of the many compositions on your web site for which you have posted unauthorized tabs. The purpose of our letter was to request that you remove all unauthorized tabs, not just those related to the four compositions.

We shall give you 2 additional weeks to remove all tabs before contacting your ISP. If the tabs are not down within that period, we shall demand that your ISP take down the site because you're posting infringing material. We hope that will not be necessary.

By the way, The Harry Fox Agency, Inc. ("HFA") is offering an experimental license to web site operators that would authorize licensees to post tabs of compositions owned or controlled by publishers affiliated with HFA. You may contact them by mail, phone or email as follows:  The Harry Fox Agency, Inc., 711 Third Avenue, New York, NY 10017, Attn:  Ms. Lauren Apolito, Vice President of Business Development, 212.922.3225, email:  lapolito@harryfox.com <mailto:lapolito@harryfox.com> .

Sincerely,

Ross J. Charap

(dictated and read)


Nanci Eisner

Assistant to Ross J. Charap, Esq.

Moses & Singer LLP

The Chrysler Building

405 Lexington Avenue

New York, NY 10174-1299
